document.title: Hitachi Energy MicroSCADA Pro/X SYS600 Products

product.name: MicroSCADA X SYS600, MicroSCADA Pro - SYS600 10.4 and earlier
MicroSCADA X SYS600, MicroSCADA Pro - SYS600 9.4 FP2 Hotfix 4 and earlier versions

notes.text: An input validation vulnerability exists in the Monitor Pro interface of MicroSCADA Pro and MicroSCADA X SYS600. An authenticated user could launch an administrator level remote code execution regardless of the authenticated user's role.CVE-2022-3388 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 8.8 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: For SYS600 10.x: update to at least SYS600 version 10.4.1 or apply general mitigation factors.
For SYS600 9.x: update to at least SYS600 version SYS600 9.4 FP2 Hotfix 5 when released, or upgrade to at least SYS600 version 10.4.1.
To install SYS600 9.4 FP2 Hotfix 5, users must have at least SYS600 9.4 FP2 Hotfix 4 installed.
For more information, see Hitachi Energy's Cybersecurity Advisory
